title: #443: Never A Bride (OOTP Chapter 9, Woes of Mrs. Weasley)
description:
• Andrew checks in from the Wizarding World... completely decked out for the holidays!
  • Laura reveals an early Christmas present that would excite any Potter fan!
  • Chapter-by-Chapter continues with Order of the Phoenix - Chapter 9: The Woes of Mrs. Weasley
  • 7-Word Summary: Harry feels envious because friends are winning
  • What's up with Umbridge "appraising" Harry?
  • Uh oh, Lucius has Fudge's ear! Is it worse that the Order thinks the Minister is NOT under the Imperius Curse?
  • Why does Harry's scar burn when thinking about Dumbledore? Is it the Voldemort connection, the Horcrux or just pure emotion?
  • Do we agree with Hermione that Sirius is acting selfishly after learning Harry has been found not guilty?
  • We do a deep dive on the Defense Against The Dark Arts position
  • Ron is named Prefect... and EVERYONE is stunned! Can't the kid just have his moment?
  • Why DID Dumbledore select Ron and Hermione as Prefects?
  • Moody tries to cheer up Harry by showing him an original Order of the Phoenix photo
  • We discuss Gideon and Fabian Prewett (Were Fred and George's names tributes to them?), Aberforth, Edgar Bones and more
  • The Boggart shows the very real fear Mrs. Weasley has of losing her family
  • Why did Molly choose to take care of the boggart herself?
  • Perspective, Harry!
  • The Umbridge (Toad) Suck Count rises!
  • Connecting The Threads, MVP of the Week and Rename The Chapter return!
  • Quizzitch: What is Luna's mother's first name?
  • This week's episode of MuggleCast is sponsored by TodayTix! For your chance to see Harry Potter and the Cursed Child in San Francisco, visit TodayTix.com/MuggleCast
  • Join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including early access to the show via our live streams!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
